pages.text: $(li)Strays are a variant of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeletons$(/l) that can be found in the snow biomes like the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_mountains)Snowy Mountains$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_taiga)Snowy Taigas$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_tundra)Snowy Tundras$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) and $(l)Arrows of Slowness$() upon death.
